entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Rosthern
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -12.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saskatoon Diefenbaker Int'l Airport 11:40 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -12.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: ENE 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 5:59 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 5:59 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
